detaileddescription.para: This document contains the description of the Bap Integration Generator Tool (BapIntGen). BapIntGen tool is used to generate integration layer of Bap Stack on Chorus in ICAS1 project.

This document does not cosist the detailed design of BAP_Chorus BAP Stack integration. For BAP_Chorus BAP Stack detailed design please refer to Enterprise Architect VW_ICAS1.Chorus.All_Cores.SoftwareDecomposition.ComplexDeviceDrivers.BAP.SW Design.
This document is to provide the details how generator is implemented and how files are being generated.
